Still, I was mildly bemused to learn that Mars Attracts, coming sometime next year, is the film’s first licensed game. But then I realised that I’d never thought to check before, which might go some way to explaining the lack of them. Do you reckon they did the pun then worked backwards from there? Respectable, honestly.
Read more
articles.title: New theme park manager Mars Attracts is the oddest bit of IP necromancy I’ve seen in quite some time

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Earlier today, old man James wagged a finger at us all sternly for not writing about Atomfall before. My turn to puff out my cheeks and look not angry, just disappointed: why haven't we covered The Stone Of Madness prior to the below Gamescom 2024 story trailer? I mean, it's only a real-time tactical stealth game set in a cursed 18th century Jesuit monastery, developed by the people behind gorgeously gross metroidvania Blasphemous. It's only got isometric art inspired by Goya and a sanity/trauma system redolent of Darkest Dungeon. Sounds like an automatic RPS write-up to me. 
 Read more
articles.title: The Blasphemous dev's new Goya-fuelled stealth tactics monastery sim is basically Umberto Eco's The Great Escape

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Remember that puzzle game Unravel and its star: a cute lad made of yarn called Yarny? He'd tackle headscratchers by unwinding the very fabric of his body, similar to how a human being might feed their intestines through a karabiner and use it as a tether for a spot of rock climbing. Well, some of the minds behind Unravel are working on new game called Hela. This time it's less about yarn and more about being a small mouse who does parkour. Still, it does retain some of the bodily gymnastics of its predecessor. Namely the use of tongues as bungee ropes.
Read more
articles.title: Former Unravel devs announce Scandinavian parkour mouse sim where you can walk on tongues

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
I've yet to discover a SteamWorld game I don't like. Whether plundering the earth in SteamWorld Dig 2 or mucking about with magic in SteamWorld Quest, these are solid and approachable adventures that enthusiastically embrace whatever theme the developers have decided upon. Cowboys? Sure. Wizards? Why not. It barely matters, as long as it results in some good puns. As a studio, Thunderful have a reputation for hopping from one style of game to the next, boiling entire genres down to their essence, and reconstituting them with competence and style to exist within a now-familiar steampunk world of colourful pals and Saturday morning cartoon jokes. The studio is a perpetual notion machine. Yes, with SteamWorld Heist 2, they're revisiting the sci-fi bullet-bouncing of their 2016 tactics game SteamWorld Heist, but they're also introducing significant changes to create a compulsive XCOM-like full of sea-faring submariners that may be their best work yet, even against a back catalogue of blinders. 
Read more
articles.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 review: a tactical trick shot across the bow of lesser strategy games

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
If you're feeling very rested and at peace today, I do not recommend you play the demo for just-announced puzzle game Wilmot Works It Out. It will relax you so much that you gently petrify. Future archaeologists will marvel at you, a smiling stone figure in the ruins of a bygone civilisation. "What exactly was going on back in 2024 to inspire such a critical intensity of chillax?" they will wonder. Then, they will spot the computer screen glowing beneath its layer of dust, and the cycle will begin anew.
 Read more
articles.title: Wilmot Works It Out is the picture puzzle sequel to the wonderful warehouse sim - here's a demo

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Sorry everyone, I might have to start doing that Token RPS Starfield Liker thing again. The Shattered Space expansion, out on September 30th, probably won’t refurbish the RPG’s reputation as an overall miss – but it does ditch the proc-gen planet bloat for a single handcrafted hellhole, a true Bethesda speciality honed by years of Fallouts and Elder Scrollseses. And, if its - sadly hands-off - Gamescom showcase is any indication, it might just double down on Starfield’s own strengths as well.
Read more
articles.title: Starfield: Shattered Space looks like a wise return to Bethesda basics

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
We’ve apparently never written about Atomfall, an oversight I’m now all too happy to correct, having played a promising forty minutes or so at Gamescom 2024. In development at Sniper Elite makers Rebellion, it’s a "survival-action game inspired by real-life events" – specifically the Windscale fire, which in 1957 coated much of northern England in radioactive fallout. Atomfall’s alternative history makes Britain’s worst nuclear disaster even more disastrous, plunging the realm into full-on post-apocalyptica and leaving your good amnesiac self to dodge death with nothing but a cricket bat and whatever you can scrounge out of sheds. I like it! Mostly.
Read more
articles.title: Atomfall plays like a S.T.A.L.K.E.R. with Scouse accents

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I've never really understood the charm of ultrawide monitors. I dare boldly to maintain that there is such a thing as Too Wide, a point beyond which the extra visual estate becomes a waste of electricity, unless you watch the screen in pairs. I can only assume people who use ultrawide monitors live in constant terror of flanking manoeuvres and demand the maximum amount of peripheral vision. Mind you, I tend to play games with my nose about 10 centimetres from the screen. Forget being flanked - it's the prospect of snipers up ahead I'm worried about.
If you're among the people who fret excessively about flankers, I've got great news from Uncle BioWare. Forthcoming RPG Dragon Age: The Veilguard will support 21:9 ultrawide monitors. The ultrawide functionality extends to cinematics - you can disable "cinematic aspect ratios" to switch off the black bars that otherwise hem in the view. It's one of several PC-specific flourishes they've just blogged about. Have a look.
 Read more
articles.title: BioWare detail Dragon Age: The Veilguard's PC-specific graphics features and controller options

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Gamescom is exploding all around us, but there is still time to lower a pincer into the pile of Steam indie game announcements and reel up the occasional treasure. In this case, it's the demo for Cupiclaw, which is possibly the first ever "roguelike deckbuilding claw machine game". You know how Balatro made you feel about Joker cards? Well, this game wants to make you feel the same about claw machines. It's a terrible turn of events, frankly. I'm sorry for inflicting yet another potential bingeplay upon you. Here's a trailer. 
Read more
articles.title: Cupiclaw wants to do for claw machines what Balatro did for poker

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Our James recently stormed off to Cologne after having one too many kills stolen by Edwin in Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. “I’m never even going to look at another videogame again!”, he declared. Unfortunately for James, he accidentally walked straight into Gamescom. “I’m starting to think that there are a lot of video games” he informed us yesterday. Horrifying if true. Still, it does sound like he’s managing to have some fun there, mainly by hitting up Saber Interactive COO and former id Software co-owner Tim Willits for some top tips on how to avenge Edwin’s thieving ways.
Tips about kill-stealing aside, James found time to ask Willits about Space Marine 2's microtransactions, and whether there was any nervousness returning to a cult hit series… especially one a lot of people had almost given up on ever seeing again. “Even the “push forward” combat of the original was part of [id’s] inspiration when we created Doom 2016,” answered Willits. “So for me personally, it’s this huge circle. It’s always intimidating working on a franchise that people love.” But, with the right team, technology, and vision he says, “it just comes together.”
Read more
articles.title: Saber boss explains Space Marine 2's microtransactions: “People don’t want to be sold horse armour anymore"

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I genuinely don't like sucker-punching video games the second they're announced, but playing Glowmade's King Of Meat is three hours of my life I won't get back, and every second I spend writing about it extends that total, dragging me closer to a regretful demise. Here's the stuff I'm more positive about: buried at the core of this spurting interactive snarkfest there is a moderately OK third-person dungeon-crawler for groups of up to four.
Read more
articles.title: Dire comedy bloodsport King Of Meat should have been called King Of Meme

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Dnes vynecháme menší dílčí novinky v budoucím vydání jádra Linux 6.12, naopak se podíváme primárně na poslední práce, které na tomto poli odvádí Intel pro své nejnovější grafické jádro generace Xe2.
articles.title: Novinky pro Linux 6.12 s důrazem na Intel Lunar Lake a Battlemage

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: K zobrazení textové informace je potřeba písmo. Jeho volba významně ovlivňuje čitelnost textu a má velký dopad na uživatelský zážitek. Pojďme se podívat, jaké máme v písmech možnosti, jak je využívat, co dělat a čemu se naopak vyhnout.
articles.title: Písma a jejich použití: od beden s odlitky ke stažení souborů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Ještě jednou se vrátíme k modelu pro lineární regresi. S ním jsme se již setkali, ovšem ve skutečnosti je i zdánlivě jednoduchý koncept lineární regrese realizován tak, že ho lze využít mnoha dalšími způsoby.
articles.title: Scikit-learn: jednoduchý a současně i univerzální model lineární regrese

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Ondřej Surý)
articles.description: Nová verze DNS serveru BIND 9.20.0 přináší významná vylepšení po dvou letech vývoje. Klíčové novinky zahrnují nové aplikační a databázové jádro, optimalizovanou podporu DNSSEC a vylepšenou kompresi DNS jmen.
articles.title: BIND 9.20: vylepšený výkon resolveru a nové databázové a aplikační jádro

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jiří Sluka)
articles.description: Pravidelná středeční sonda do světa software. Dnes se podíváme na SQL klienta, budeme zkoumat elementy testovaných aplikací a nakonec si zaznamenáme čas strávený na projektech.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (4. 9. 2024): mějte své databáze pevně v rukou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Grafické karty EGA a VGA byly postaveny na konceptu takzvaných bitových rovin. To si vyžádalo podporu různých čtecích a zápisových režimů, jež sice komplikovaly programování, ovšem přinesly velmi rychlé přenosy v rámci video RAM.
articles.title: Skrytá síla karty VGA: čtecí a zápisové režimy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Monika Kutějová)
articles.description: Podíváme se na zneužití chyb v prohlížečích Chrome a Safari, botnetové útoky skrze IP kamery, quishingovou kampaň využívající Microsoft Sway a nové útoky čínské skupiny Volt Typhoon.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: chyby v prohlížečích a nová quishingová kampaň

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: ElasticSearch a Kibana jsou znovu k dispozici pod open-source licencí. Aktualizace od společnosti Microsoft narušila nastavení dualbootu pro uživatele Linuxu na počítačích, kde byl povolen Secure Boot.
articles.title: Aktualizace Microsoftu narušila spouštění Linuxu, Kibana je znovu open source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Šest týdnů do uvedení Plasmy 6.2, známe poslední novinky, Microsoft vylepšuje D3D12 akceleraci videa v Mesa, VKD3D 1.13 též vylepšuje Direct3D 12 API nad Vulkanem, QR kernel panic postavený na Rustu.
articles.title: Kernel panic s QR v Linuxu 6.12, neshody Rust vývojářů se správci částí jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vrtal mi hlavou tripple buffering v KDE i GNOME a jeho vliv na plynulost desktopu se starými CPU+GPU Intel. Nakonec mě toto téma dovedlo k přesvědčení, které shrnuje název dnešního povídání.
articles.title: Čtyřjádrový procesor už na linuxový desktop přestává stačit

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Intel se podělil o několik důležitých novinek týkajících se vyšetřování problému s nestabilitou Vmin Shift u desktopových procesorů Intel Core 13. a 14. generace, o které jsme psali už v srpnu. Výrobce potvrdil, že nová generace procesorů s kódovým označením Arrow Lake a Lunar Lake problémem netrpí.
articles.title: Intel vydal nový seznam procesorů, které nejsou ovlivněny nestabilitou „Vmin Shift“

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojářům operačního systému Redox OS napsaném v jazyce Rust se podařilo vyřešit výkonnostní úzké hrdlo, takže je systém mnohem výkonnější, když běží jako virtuální stroj. V některých syntetických benchmarcích dokonce dokáže běžet „o něco rychleji“ než Linux. Žádná konkrétní čísla ale zveřejněna nebyla.
articles.title: Redox zlepšil výkon ve virtuálním prostředí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili novou verzi virtualizačního nástroje QEMU označenou jako 9.1. Přináší řadu změn v mnoha oblastech, nejdůležitější je ale podpora nových procesorů Intel Icelake-Server-v7, SapphireRapids-v3 a SierraForest a podporu AMD SEV-SNP použitelnou s novými jádry s podporou pro AMD EPYC.
articles.title: Vyšlo QEMU 9.1 s podporou AMD SEV-SNP a akcelerací Intel IAA při migraci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Mozilla má zájem o dekodér obrázků JPEG XL napsaný v jazyce Rust kvůli jeho paměťové bezpečnosti. Bobby Holley, technický šéf Firefoxu, vyjádřil svůj postoj k podpoře dekodéru obrázků JPEG XL pro Firefox napsaného v Rustu. Říká v něm, že vývojáři zvažují zařazení nového dekodéru napsaného v Rustu.
articles.title: Mozilla by chtěla dekodér pro JPEG XL napsaný v Rustu, vyvine jej zřejmě Google

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V repozitářích pro aktuální Debian je sice k dispozici více než 74 tisíc balíčků pro architekturu x86_64, ale ne všechny balíčky jsou dobře udržované a část z nich již dlouho nebyla udržována či aktualizována. Vývojáři Debianu nedávno začali diskutovat o tom, jak začít z archivu odstraňovat další z těchto dlouho neudržovaných balíčků.
articles.title: Vývojáři Debianu diskutují o odstranění neudržovaných balíčků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Google oznámil, že zdrojový kód systému Android 15 byl uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source Project (AOSP). Pro telefony Pixel by přitom systém byl měl být vydán během několika následujících týdnů. Ostatní výrobci na svá zařízení dostanou Android 15 v řádu měsíců. Nyní mohou na portaci začít také tvůrci alternativních ROM.
articles.title: Android 15 uvolněn do projektu Android Open-Source

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Pytelka)
articles.description: Tým věnující se projektu Bugzilla připravil po pěti letech novou stabilní verzi 5.2. Současně pokračuje vývoj budoucí verze 6 (projekt Harmony), společně byla vydána verze 5.9.1 - Developer Preview Release.
articles.title: Vyšla Bugzilla 5.2 a 5.91

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Otevřený firmware Coreboot v nové verzi 24.08 podporuje tři desítky dalších desek, kde mezi těmi uživatelsky běžně kupovanými najdeme ASRock Fatal1ty Z87 Professional, Z87E-ITX, Z87M OC Formula, Z97E-ITX/ac či Gigabyte GA-H61M-S2P-R3 a notebook HP EliteBook 8560w. Celkově více než 900 patchů od více než 130 vývojářů stojí i za opravou řady chyb.
articles.title: Coreboot 24.08 přidává 31 základních desek a počáteční podporu Intel Panther Lake

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Příslušný Wayland protokol xx-color-management-v4 pro správu barev (color management) je již součástí kandidáta na vydání ostré verze kompozitoru GNOME Mutter 47. Shrnuje řadu pull requestů implementujích podporu pro barevné prostory sRGB a PQ+Bt.2020 (Perceptual Quantize).
articles.title: GNOME Mutter 47 přinese správu barev na Waylandu a opravu EGLDevice pro starší GeForce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Zatímco s JPEG XL se Google moc nezabývá, AVIF má u něj stále lépe a lépe ustláno. Po jinak běžně Googlem podporovaném formátu WebP, odvozeném od videa WebM, tedy komprese VP8/VP9, nyní do vyhledávání Googlu nyní přibývá podpora obrázků ve formátu AVIF.
articles.title: Google přidává podporu AVIF do vyhledávání

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Byla objevena zranitelnost v kryptografické knihovně společnosti Infineon, která se používá v zařízeních YubiKey řady 5 a Security Key Series s firmwarem před verzí 5.7.0 a YubiHSM 2 s firmwarem před verzí 2.4.0. Společnost Yubico potvrdila dopad na její bezpečnostní tokeny, závažnost ohodnotila stupněm střední.
articles.title: Chyba v knihovně Infineon ohrožuje soukromé klíče z tokenů YubiKey a dalších zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: VPN umožňuje bezpečně propojit různá zařízení pomocí šifrovaných tunelů. Umožňuje také zapojit uživatele do vnitřní sítě přes zabezpečený přístupový bod. Na školení si prakticky ukážeme, jak to celé nastavit a zprovoznit pomocí nejnovějšího protokolu WireGuard.
articles.title: WireGuard: nasazujeme VPN rychle a jednoduše (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Ač to podle počasí nevypadá, prázdniny skončily. Nesmutněte však, neboť již tento čtvrtek bude Virtuální Bastlírna - setkání elektroniků, bastlířů, ajťáků a všech milovníků techniky! Jaké novinky a témata tam čekají?
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 42: nový mikrokontrolér od Raspberry Pi Foundation

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vývojáři Intelu svižně dokončují podporu druhé velké generace svých GPU. Pod názvem Battlemage se snad skutečně objeví plnohodnotné grafické karty, ne jen integrovaná jádra (ač o tom stále kromě neoficiálních zvěstí nemáme informace), nicméně dále vyvíjená podpora v Linuxu a projektech souvisejících naznačuje, že tento projekt Intel k ledu nedal.
articles.title: Podpora pro Intel Battlemage v Linuxu 6.12 a Mesa 24.3 finišuje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Mnoho novinek ve Firefoxu 130 věru co do počtu není, ale dvě z nich potěší našince z Česka i Slovenska. Firefox 130 přináší podporu překladů dílčích částí webových stránek, které již samy jako celek byly přeloženy. V překladech ve Firefoxu pak mezi novými 11 jazyky nalezneme i češtinu a slovenštinu. Mozilla zde nijak, na rozdíl od jiných, nesleduje, co si uživatel nechává přeložit.
articles.title: Firefox 130 vylepšuje překlady stránek, nově umí i češtinu a slovenštinu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Rawtherapee 5.11 je už více než týden venku a konečně se z domovského webu projektu dozvídáme soupis novinek. Mezi nimi nechybí například přechod na skutečný HiDPI režim zobrazení (kde je potřeba), nastavitelnou hodnotu maximálního zoomu v editoru, možnost nechat si při prohlížení fotek zobrazit v daném adresáři i jeho podadresáře.
articles.title: Rawtherapee 5.11 přechází na libraw a přináší vylepšení prakticky ve všech nástrojích

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Play Store na Androidu byl doposud při aktualizaci více aplikací pomalý. Aktualizoval aplikace po jedné, vždy čekal, až se předchozí aplikace stáhne a nainstaluje.
articles.title: Play Store na Androidu bude nyní aktualizovat až tři aplikace současně

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Téměř před rokem se v jádře 6.8 objevil první ovladač napsaný v Rustu. Šlo o síťovou kartu Asix AX88796B. Do jádra 6.12 se chystá další ovladač a je to opět síťová karta.
articles.title: Další síťová karta bude mít jaderný ovladač v Rustu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Žebříčků populárnosti programovacích jazyků existuje spousta. Server ZDNET vytvořil svůj žebříček tak, že dal dohromady výsledky devíti známých indexů. Jsou tu tři Stack Overflow, tři IEEE, PYPL, Tiobe a GitHub.
articles.title: Nejpopulárnější programovací jazyky podle ZDNET: Python, JavaScript a Java

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Proxmox je moderní virtualizační platforma, která v mnoha případech může nahradit VMware. Je open-source, zdarma a je postaven na otevřených technologiích jako KVM, LXC, CEPH a dalších. Pokud potřebujete provozovat virtualizaci, Proxmox je pro vás ideální stack a na našem workshopu Proxmox se dozvíte, jak na něj.
articles.title: Proxmox: moderní virtualizační platforma schopná nahradit VMware (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V roce 2021 byly vyhledávací nástroj ElasticSearch a vizualizační platforma Kibana přelicencovány pod nesvobodnou licencí SSPL (Server Side Public License). Nyní společnost Elastic oznámila, že tyto projekty budou distribuovatelné také pod licencí Affero GPL.
articles.title: ElasticSearch a Kibana se opět stávají svobodným softwarem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Světoznámý zpravodajský web AnandTech oznámil, že po 27 letech ukončil svou činnost. Web, který v roce 1997 začal jako technologický blog jednoho mladého nadšence, se postupem času stal jedním z nejznámějších médií zaměřených na počítačové komponenty. Přinášel mnoho velmi podrobných recenzí a užitečných technických informací.
articles.title: Zpravodajský server AnandTech po 27 letech končí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři konference LinuxDays ukončil veřejné přihlašování přednášek. Teď je na vás, abyste vybrali nejlepší témata. Hlasovat můžete do pondělí 9. září. Poté podle výsledků hlasování organizátoři sestaví program pro letošní ročník.
articles.title: Hlasujte o tématech pro letošní ročník LinuxDays

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Adam)
articles.description: MikroTik na svém youtubovém kanále a na fóru oznámil první veřejnou betaverzi administrační aplikace pro routery WinBox 4. Aplikace je určená pro konfiguraci routerů a switchů se systémem RouterOS. Hlavní novinkou je především nativní podpora UI pro systémy Windows, Linux a macOS, na kterou se dle článku na fóru čekalo 15 let.
articles.title: MikroTik oznámil betaverzi konfiguračního nástroje WinBox verze 4

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V Epic Store je možné zdarma získat Fallout Classic Collection, což je Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics.
articles.title: Fallout, Fallout 2 a Fallout Tactics zdarma v Epic Store

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Black Hole Moon: Máme tu další nápad, jak by mimozemské civilizace mohly čerpat energii z černých děr. Odchylky v interakcích částic mají ukazovat na existenci nových bosonů. Předpovídají nový detekovatelný zdroj gravitačních vln z kolabujících hvězd.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Informatici z Matfyzu získali US patent na vícezdrojový překlad

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ness Czech spouští nový inovační datový hub pro střední a východní Evropu. Fortinet rozšiřuje bezpečnostní platformu pro ochranu kyberneticko-fyzikálních systémů. Umělá inteligence předvídá zločin a odhalí i ukrytou zbraň. Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat. Red Hat na podporu svých implementačních partnerů rozšířil partnerský program.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Budoucnost podnikové umělé inteligence není o větším množství dat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nový objev ve světě polovodičů: Vědci potvrdili existenci další modifikace uhlíku. Black Hole Moon: Máme tu další nápad, jak by mimozemské civilizace mohly čerpat energii z černých děr. Vodu v hlubinách Marsu nepřeceňovat.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Technosignatury se možná dají snadno přehlédnout

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Slevy v akci Back to School pokračují. Jedna ze stránek, která poskytuje nejlepší nabídku a je také spolehlivá, je Goodoffer24.com. Zde jsou ceny které se vymykají, zvláště pro operační systém Microsoft, a to jak pro současnou verzi, tak předchozí, a také jak pro verze Pro či Home. A dále také, s exkluzivním kódem, můžete získat další 30% slevu, abyste se mohli těšit z doživotních licencí. Nebo jinak, platíte jen jednou a můžete zapomenout na problémy.
articles.title: Slevy na Goodoffer24 Back to School až 91 %: Windows 11 jen za €20, Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 35/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Acronis představuje novou verzi Acronis True Image na českém trhu. Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %. Vědci vyvinuli metodu detekce jednoatomových defektů v polovodičích. Každá pátá firma zasažena útoky na dodavatelský řetězec hardwaru. České firmy platí po útoků ransomwarem výkupné i 6 milionů Kč.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Prodej podnikového softwaru vzrostl v roce 2023 o 12 %

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Navrhují hledat temnou hmotu v neutronových hvězdách. Nová analýza dat z Webbova dalekohledu ukazuje, že s Hubbleovou konstantou nemusí být problém.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Nitridy uhlíku mohou konkurovat diamantu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 34/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V letních měsících byly vydány aktualizace openSUSE Leap a SUSE, FreeBSD, Debianu, na testování zabezpečení zaměřených distribucí Kali a Parrot, dále např. IPFire, EasyOS, Tails či EndeavourOS.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 23-26/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: AI působí jako katalyzátor ransomwarových útoků, ale i jako jejich brzda. Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě. Westcom 3D LAB demonstruje možnosti integrace bezpečnostních řešení více dodavatelů. Velké jazykové modely by mohly samy pro sebe generovat programy. A k čemu to může být dobré? Povede umělá inteligence k modernizaci finančních služeb?
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Hybridní již nejsou pouze cloudy, ale i sítě

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 33/2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána (𝕏) srpnová aktualizace aneb nová verze 1.93 editoru zdrojových kódů Visual Studio Code (Wikipedie). Přehled novinek i s náhledy a animovanými gify v poznámkách k vydání. Ve verzi 1.93 vyjde také VSCodium, tj. komunitní sestavení Visual Studia Code bez telemetrie a licenčních podmínek Microsoftu.
articles.title: Visual Studio Code a VSCodium 1.93

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Laravel stojící za stejnojmenným open source PHP frameworkem získala investici 57 milionů dolarů od společnosti Accel. Především na Laravel Cloud.
articles.title: Laravel získal investici 57 milionů dolarů od společnosti Accel

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána verze 1.81.0 programovacího jazyka Rust (Wikipedie). Podrobnosti v poznámkách k vydání. Řešena je také zranitelnost CVE-2024-43402. Vyzkoušet Rust lze například na stránce Rust by Example.
articles.title: Rust 1.81.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vládní CERT vydal (𝕏) novou verzi nástroje maldump. Ten slouží k extrakci souborů z karantén různých antivirových programů. A to jak z živého systému, tak z obrazu disku.
articles.title: maldump 0.4.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Meeting ESP komunity - podzimní edice 2024 proběhne v pátek 18. října v Brně. V přípravě jsou přednášky od vývojářů z Espressifu, lokálních firem i zapálených nadšenců do ESP a také praktický workshop a ukázky nových čipů.
articles.title: Meeting ESP komunity - podzimní edice 2024

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Systém pro správu hlášení chyb Bugzilla byl podle plánu vydán v nových verzích 5.2, 4.4.14, 5.0.4.1, 5.3.3 a 5.9.1, kde 5.2 představuje novou stabilní řadu, 4.4.14 by měla být poslední ve staré řadě 4.4, jíž končí podpora na přelomu roku, 5.0.4.1 je udržovací opravné vydání staré řady 5.0, dosavadní stabilní řada 5.1 byla přejmenována na 5.3 (nyní 5.3.3) a konečně vývojová verze 5.9.1 směřuje k budoucímu velkému vydání Bugzilly 6.
articles.title: Bugzilla 5.2 a aktualizace dalších řad vydání

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Správce sbírek Tellico (Wikipedie) byl vydán v nové major verzi 4.0. Přináší podporu Qt 6 a KDE Frameworks 6.
articles.title: Tellico 4.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: V sobotu 7. září lze navštívit Maker Faire Pardubice, festival plný workshopů, interaktivních činností a především nadšených a zvídavých lidí.
articles.title: Maker Faire Pardubice

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Na čem aktuálně pracují vývojáři webového prohlížeče Ladybird? Byl publikován přehled vývoje za srpen (YouTube).
articles.title: Vývoj webového prohlížeče Ladybird (08/2024)

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Yubico potvrdila bezpečnostní problém YSA-2024-03 svých tokenů YubiKey 5 a Security Key s firmwarem do verze 5.7, YubiKey Bio s firmwarem do verze 5.7.2 a YubiHSM 2 s firmwarem do verze 2.4.0. Útočník může z tokenu vytáhnout soukromý ECDSA klíč. Více na stránce EUCLEAK (pdf).
articles.title: Bezpečnostní problém tokenů od společnosti Yubico

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the recently covered patches on Phoronix that enabled Intel Xe2 graphics out-of-the-box / by-default for Lunar Lake and Battlemage with the Mesa 24.3-devel Git code, Mesa 24.2.2 is out today in stable form that back-ports these Xe2 support changes...
articles.title: Mesa 24.2.2 Enables Intel Lunar Lake & Battlemage Xe2 Graphics Out-Of-The-Box

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: KDE e.V. announced the availability today of their annual report for covering 2023. While they made a lot of accomplishments and worked a lot on KDE Plasma 6 development, it was another year they unfortunately operated in the red funding wise...
articles.title: KDE Again Operated At A Loss During 2023

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Continuing on with the AmpereOne performance benchmarking while having the AmpereOne A192-32X in the lab within a Supermicro ARS-211M-NR R13SPD server, the next set of benchmarks is looking at the performance when using the near-final Linux 6.11 kernel. Additionally, quantifying the performance impact of using the ARM64 64K page size kernel as an alternative to the default 4K page size.
articles.title: AmpereOne Performance On Linux 6.11 Kernel, 4K vs. 64K Page Size Comparison

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Last year to much excitement in our community was the new AMD project announcement of openSIL as an open-source CPU silicon initialization project that is an advancement for open-source firmware and to eventually replace AMD's AGESA across both client and server processors. This week an exciting new update on AMD OpenSIL was shared and that they are still on-track for having it production-ready next year...
articles.title: AMD Reveals Latest Plans For Open-Source openSIL With Replacing AGESA, Zen 6 Milestone

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ah the memories of old AGP graphics cards... But it's largely just that these days: distant memories. For anyone by chance still running an Accelerated Graphics Port (AGP) graphics card in production, FreeBSD is looking at deprecating its generic AGP driver and then potentially removing it in FreeBSD 15.0...
articles.title: FreeBSD 15 Might Drop Its AGP Driver For Old Graphics Cards

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The first alpha release of OpenSSL 3.4 is now available for testing as the next feature update to this widely-used SSL library / cryptography toolkit...
articles.title: OpenSSL 3.4 Alpha 1 Released With New Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With Linux 6.12 the Lunar Lake and Battlemage graphics are being enabled by default for out-of-the-box support with Intel's next-gen Xe2 graphics. Over in user-space the Intel OpenGL and Vulkan driver code has also begun enabling Xe2 graphics by default for use when running on Linux 6.12+. In Mesa besides no longer being hidden by the force probe option, a warning is now removed so users aren't told about unsupported Vulkan support when using Xe2 hardware...
articles.title: Intel's Open-Source Vulkan Driver Will No Longer Warn Over Using Xe2 Graphics

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux 6.11 merged getrandom() in the vDSO Support for very fast yet secure user-space random number generation needs. That work was initially focused on x86_64 but beginning with Linux 6.12 and following on this getrandom() vDSO implementation will see expanded CPU architecture support...
articles.title: getrandom() vDSO Coming To More Architectures With Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Succeeding OpenZFS 2.2.5 from early August is now OpenZFS 2.2.6 that brings various fixes plus newer Linux kernel compatibility...
articles.title: OpenZFS 2.2.6 Debuts With Linux 6.10 Support & Early Linux 6.11 Compatibility

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: QEMU 9.1 is out in stable form today as the newest feature release to this open-source processor emulator that plays a vital role within the free software Linux virtualization stack...
articles.title: QEMU 9.1 Released With AMD SEV-SNP Support & Intel IAA Acceleration During VM Migrations

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Continuing on with the AMD Ryzen 9000 series Linux benchmarking, today's testing is looking at the performance and power impact of the AMD Ryzen 9 9950X when adjusting the CPU frequency scaling driver, governor, and Energy Performance Preference (EPP) tunable to help look at the performance and power efficiency characteristics of this current flagship Zen 5 desktop processor.
articles.title: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X Power/Performance With CPU Frequency Scaling Driver Tunables

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The Rust-written Redox OS open-source operating system has managed to address a performance bottleneck allowing this platform to perform much faster now when running as a virtual machine (VM) and for some synthetic benchmarks even able to run "slightly faster" than Linux...
articles.title: Redox OS Unlocks Faster VM Performance, "Slightly Faster" Than Linux In Some Benchmarks

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following yesterday's initial tuning of the "znver5" target for the AMD Zen 5 CPUs with the GCC 15 compiler, several more rounds of compiler tuning/optimizations were merged for benefiting the Ryzen AI 300 series, Ryzen 9000 series desktops, and upcoming EPYC Turin processors...
articles.title: More AMD Zen 5 Tuning/Optimizations Merged For The GCC 15 Compiler

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: While using the older Qualcomm Snapdragon 8xc Gen 3 (SC8280XP) SoC and not the exciting Snapdragon X1 Elite, Linux kernel patches were posted this week for enabling the Microsoft Surface Pro 9 5G to boot with the mainline kernel...
articles.title: Linux Patches Enable Partially-Working, Snapdragon-Powered Microsoft Surface Pro 9 5G

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Mozilla is interested in a Rust-written JPEG-XL image decoder for its memory safety characteristics compared to the existing C++ code they rely on for JPEG-XL image support in Firefox. While Google previously removed JPEG-XL support from Chrome/Chromium, it may be Google that comes to the rescue and writes a Rust-based JPEG-XL image decoder that can then be shipped by Firefox...
articles.title: Mozilla Is Interested In A Rust JPEG-XL Decoder For Firefox & Google Might Develop It

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Linux 6.11 introduces block atomic write support including for NVMe and SCSI devices. With a new set of patches posted this week, atomic write support is wired up for the RAID0 MD code...
articles.title: Linux Patches Posted For RAID0 Atomic Write Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: There are six accepted blocker bugs so far for the Fedora 41 Beta and three of them all pertain to Raspberry Pi issues...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Bugs Currently Make Up Half Of The Fedora 41 Blocker Bugs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Weston 14.0 was released today as the newest feature release for this reference Wayland compositor...
articles.title: Wayland's Weston 14.0 Compositor Released

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: When it comes to the Rust programming language support within the Linux kernel one of the limitations is that the CPU architecture support isn't as widespread. Currently Rust for Linux supports x86_64, AArch64 (ARM64) little-endian, LoongArch, and RISC-V. While those cover the main targets, POWER is notably missing and many other niche CPU architectures supported by the Linux kernel especially for aging platforms. Patches posted today to the Linux kernel mailing list would extend the Rust support to MIPS...

And if, like me, you haven’t paid close attention to the game’s story, you may stumble upon the encounter and decide to try your hand at it without fully understanding what’s happening. So, how exactly do you beat the Manibus in Once Human?


What is the Manibus in Once Human?


Screenshot by Destructoid


The Manibus is not the weird, legged bus that can be found traipsing around the world — what many of us probably assume when we first start playing. The Manibus in Once Human is an Old One or Great One that has “ripped through the heavens, thrusting its tentacles down through the clouds.”

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The shot meter has undergone a big change in NBA 2K25, but you can choose between different options.


It's been a long debate about whether you should use the meter or not. This year, the familiar meter from the older NBA 2K games has been removed. Instead, you get three options that are distinctly different from the older shapes. By default, you get the upward-moving arrow, but it's not my favorite, and it might not be yours as well. Thankfully, changing the appearance of the shot meter is extremely easy.


NBA 2K25 changing shot meter guide


This year, you get to pick from the following options:



Arrow: A Small arrow moves upwards.


Ring: A Circular ring that diminishes as you attempt a throw.


Circle: A circle that reduces in size and disappears.



No matter which game mode you play, the shot meter can be changed in all of them.


Image via Destructoid



The main game settings can be accessed from Features.


If you play MyTeam and MyCareer, you can change the shot meter from the settings within those respective modes.


Go to Customize HUD.


From there, select "Shot Meter Shots."


Go to the fourth option in this section - Graphic.


From here, you can choose one of the three available options.


You can also change the color of the shot meter.


The size and placement can also be changed based on your preferences.



That's all you need to know about how to change the jump shot meter in NBA 2K25. While it's a good guide for beginners, you will want to turn it off eventually. When the meter is turned off, you'll get a bonus success rate on your green-timed throws, increasing their chances of going inside the basket. It could take you some to get used to, but the switch is definitely worth the effort.


Make sure to make the changes individually across all game modes. Otherwise, they won't reflect during a game. 

The post How to change shot meter in NBA 2K25 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to change shot meter in NBA 2K25

articles.author: David Morgan
articles.description:
Dragonflight may be over, but one of its best features - customizable mounts - remains. This time, there's just one mount to customize: the Delver's Dirigible. 


What's a dirigible? I think it's just an...old-timey flying machine? I mean, it sure looks like one. Here's how to get it.


Complete Chapter 1 of the War Within Campaign


First, you'll need to complete the entire first chapter of the campaign, which takes you through each of the expansion's zones, introducing you to new allies and races along the way. This is probably a given if you're, you know, playing the expansion. 


Finishing the campaign will lead you back to Dornogal, where you'll pick up chapter 2 after reaching Renown level 4 with each faction. 


Begin Chapter 2, and accept the 'Bountiful Delves' quest from Brann


A few short steps into the campaign's second chapter, you'll be shown around to various stations in Dornogal that pertain to the endgame, such as item upgrade vendors and the Delver's headquarters. The quest Bountiful Delves appears as a purple exclamation mark above Brann during this step, and you'll need to accept (and complete) it for the mount. 


Screenshot by Destructoid.


This quest requires you to get your hands on a Restored Coffer Key and complete a Bountiful Delve on any difficulty. You actually don't need to use the key in the Delve (which is helpful if you, like me, blew all yours during early access) to complete the quest, you only have to get your hands on one. 


With those steps done, return to Brann and turn in your quest to get another one, which only has one step: receive your new mount. Congratulations!

The post How to unlock the Delver’s Dirigible customizable mount in WoW: The War Within appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock the Delver’s Dirigible customizable mount in WoW: The War Within

articles.author: David Morgan
articles.description:
Greetings, fellow spelunkers. If you're enjoying The War Within's new Delves (well, what's currently available, anyway), then you're also probably gunning for those Restored Coffer Keys, which give extra rewards at the end of their Bountiful variations. A word of warning, though: if you want to put them to good use, keep them in your back pocket a while longer.


Bountiful Delve rewards and you


Bountiful Delves reward a guaranteed piece of gear, assuming you've got a Restored Coffer Key to unlock their exclusive chest, of course. This piece of gear's item level and upgrade track will vary depending on the level of Delve you're tackling, with a hard cap at level 8 of item level 603. 


This means you'll get the absolute best possible gear from any given Bountiful Delve at level 8. The problem? Those don't unlock until September 10, so if you're blowing your keys on the current highest level 3, you're doing yourself a disservice. 


Screenshot by Destructoid.


If a level 8 is a bit too salty for your taste, you can get "Champion" level gear (the highest upgrade track available in Delves) from level 7 as well. It'll just be two upgrade tiers lower, at an item level of 597.


Getting Restored Coffer Keys


None of this matters if you don't have keys. I have a whole heaping guide up over here, but the long and short of it is this: You get four guaranteed keys a week from "caches," those chests you get from weekly quests like Theatre Troupe, Spreading the Light, Special Assignment World Quests, etc. Beyond that, you'll need to get fragments from lucky World Quests or Worldsoul Memory Events. I'd say you can expect to get about five keys a week on average. Happy Delving!

The post A WoW: War Within reminder to save your Coffer Keys until next week appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A WoW: War Within reminder to save your Coffer Keys until next week

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
If you grew up in the '90s like me, then you’ve likely got at least one fond memory of The Rugrats. Starting on September 12, Epic Games Store is giving players the opportunity to get Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland entirely for free. 


Image via The MIX Games


The Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland is a thoroughly enjoyable dive into epic nostalgia. Filled with collectables to find, interchangeable characters with special abilities, and levels that look like something directly out of the cartoons you grew up watching. 


If you’re feeling even more nostalgic and want to truly take a trip down memory lane, you can always play in retro style by switching to 8-bit mode. I played the Adventures in Gameland demo in March and thoroughly enjoyed it. Everything from the music to the voices brought back wave upon wave of nostalgia, so I highly recommend any '90s kid make the most of this freebie when it arrives.


Also, there’s multiplayer, which means you can wander around the Rugrats house (and beyond) with a friend, and really bring those memories of cartoons past to life. On top of that, it's coming to Epic Games Store as a freebie only two days after it's set to release! What’s not to love?


Image via Konami


If you’re not ready to be overwhelmed by nostalgia, you could always go for the second game on offer that week — Super Crazy Rhythm Castle. You can play solo, or with up to three friends, making the approach to Rhythm Castle to try and take down King Ferdinand. 


The game has over 30 tracks of all genres to play your way through, so there’s something for all tastes. Imagine Guitar Hero, but with cuter graphics and a story of overcoming adversity and puzzle solving on the side. It’s all about embracing chaos and, if there’s ever something I can get on board with, it’s chaotic fun.

The post Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland will be free on Epic Games Store from September 12 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland will be free on Epic Games Store from September 12

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
I do these reminders/bumps for the fantastic/amazing Destructoid Changelog Newsletter every two weeks/fortnight, and it can be difficult to figure out how to rephrase why you should sign up. But I’m not a coward, and only cowards use copy/paste. I just flex my wrinkly writer brain to churn up some new words.


Have you heard that the Destructoid Changelog Newsletter is a hit at parties? Maybe! I don’t get invited to parties. It arrives every Friday and comes packed with a recap of all the week’s reviews, weird articles, and retro stuff that I like. It’s like me showing up at your doorstep every week, except you can just close the tab instead of calling the police to get me to leave.


That’s right! Not only will I wish you a good week and draw your attention to some cool things you might have missed, but I’ll also tell you about what I’m playing that week. I play a lot of weird stuff. It’s what I do instead of going to parties.


And this is just between you and me, but we’re also cooking up some sort of monthly surprise for anyone signed up. What is it? I don’t know, it’s a surprise! Also, I haven’t settled on anything yet. The next time I do one of these reminders/bumps, I’ll probably have something more solid to tell you, but it will be cool. Cool in a “get off my doorstep, Zoey,” kind of way.


Tell your friends! Tell your therapist! Tell me (what you’d like to see in the newsletter by leaving a comment below)! Is your Friday ready for this!?

The post Have a finer Friday with the Destructoid Changelog Newsletter appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Have a finer Friday with the Destructoid Changelog Newsletter

articles.description:
We've been dealt yet another radical, multiplying hand as a release date has been revealed for Balatro Mobile. The iOS and Android version of LocalThunk's widely-acclaimed poker roguelike launches via the App Store, Google Play, and Apple Arcade on September 26, 2024.


Watch as Jimbo ominously introduces the new ports in the release date trailer: 




Already a hit on portable platforms like Nintendo Switch and Steam Deck — as well as PC and all other major consoles — taking Balatro on the go just makes sense. Balatro Mobile has been further tweaked to suit its new platforms, including the addition of remastered controls for touchscreen devices. 


Beyond that, the rest of Balatro Mobile appears to be exactly what it should be: Balatro. You've got an abundance of Jokers with special powers you can use with your decks, Campaign Mode and Challenge Mode, and the one-more-run card-dealing madness that remains an utter delight.


Jokers wild


Screenshot via Playstack


If you're already well-versed in Balatro, or just want some further insight into where the whole thing came from, then boy, do I have a podcast for you. The excellent Eggplant: The Secret Lives of Games podcast had LocalThunk on back in April, and it's absolutely worth a listen, whether you're into the game itself or just love game dev chat. 


Balatro was already a brutal time vampire, doing its best to magically whittle away hours before our very eyes. With the game even more accessible to everyone, all I can recommend is that you all go ahead and kiss your free time goodbye. 

The post Balatro Mobile heads to iOS and Android on September 26 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Balatro Mobile heads to iOS and Android on September 26

Lautaro Martinez: 87



I like this Pacho FUTTIES card, although he won't replace my starting CBs. I wish it had either Anticipate+ or Intercept+ (it has the silver versions), but the presence of Long Ball+ and Quick Step+. If you boost his Passing and Dribbling (both 90), he might work as an extremely defensive CDM as well. Just because we are in the last two weeks before EA FC 25 comes out, why not give him a try?

The post EA FC 24: How to complete Willian Pacho FUTTIES SBC appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 24: How to complete Willian Pacho FUTTIES SBC

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
While the new weapons of Destiny 2's Echoes Episode have been the main highlight, some of the returning weapons are also intriguing. The Perfect Paradox, for example, has quickly returned to its place as a mainstay in most arsenals and a capable shotgun for both PvE and PvP content.


One such returning weapon takes on a rather new form of grenade launcher, but one that is surprisingly great for ad clear. Here's the god roll for the Martyr's Retribution grenade launcher in Destiny 2.


The best perks and attachments for the Martyr's Retribution god roll in Destiny 2


Image via Destructoid.


Martyr's Retribution sports the Wave Frame archetype, meaning it has one round in its clip and sends an energy wave out upon impact. This wave does quite a bit of damage but does cause the impact itself to be considerably weaker. Compared to some grenade launchers, this makes it far less suited for boss damage and more so for ad clear. The following perks and attachments help play into that role:



Launcher Barrel: Quick Launch


Magazine: High-Velocity Rounds


Perk 1: Heal Clip


Perk 2: Incandescent



Quick Launch causes any shots from the Martyr's Retribution to come out fast while increasing handling speed. Easier use of the weapon is nothing to scoff at. High-Velocity Rounds further increases that projectile speed while also bringing in reload speed. Given we aren't running Auto-Loading Holster, that's quite helpful.


Heal Clip is great for supporting yourself and your allies, especially since you'll be focusing on many lower-health enemies, reloading frequently, and getting plenty of kills to trigger it. Incandescent aids that goal, causing scorch to nearby targets and improving the area of effect damage.

The post Destiny 2 Martyr’s Retribution god roll – Best perks and attachments appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Destiny 2 Martyr’s Retribution god roll – Best perks and attachments

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Reina is one of the many future romanceable villagers in Fields of Mistria and, like all of them, she comes with her own likes and dislikes. Giving her gifts that she loves increases your friendship with her faster, while giving Reina hated gifts won’t do you any favors. 


Reina is the daughter of Josephine and Hemlock, older sister to both Maple and Luc, and can usually be found in or around the Sleeping Dragon Inn. She loves to cook, and is a rich source of recipes if you complete some of her Request Board quests. 


Reina’s loved gifts in Fields of Mistria


Screenshot by Destructoid


With her love of cooking, it should come as no surprise that Reina loves receiving food-based gifts. Most of Reina’s loved dishes can be cooked using gathered resources, so I’ll list their recipes below.…
articles.title: Fields of Mistria: Reina gift guide and how to get each item

articles.author: Tiago Manuel
articles.description:
Deadlock is a rare phenomenon, a genre-bender already enjoying a vast player base despite not being out of alpha. Yamato, the Katana-wielding Yokai from Valve's new third-person MOBA shooter, is a tricky one to get right, and here is the best build to do so.


Screenshot via Destructoid.


Best Yamato Ability point order


1. Power Slash: Channels a long-ranged (82 feet, 25 meters) slash over 1.5 seconds. You can release it at any time, but max damage (170) is only attained if you wait for the full charge. Eight-second cooldown.


Upgrades:
1 AP: +60 bullet resist while channeling


2 AP: applies 40% move slow for 3 seconds 


5 AP: +200 damage to the fully-channeled attack


2. Crimson Slash: 42-foot Ranged slash that deals 60 damage, slows the fire rate of enemies by 30% for 4 seconds, a…
articles.title: Deadlock: Best Yamato build

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
In NBA 2K25's MyTeam mode, an evolution player is one one of the best ways to improve your team.


Unlike standard cards, evolution items can improve over time. While there's a limit on how much they can grow, the improvements will dramatically change the look and feel of your cards. In fact, you can get up to five starter evolution players when beginning your MyTeam journey in Season 1. Let's take a look at how you can improve all five cards and take them all the way up from Emerald to Ruby.


NBA 2K25 MyTeam evolution guide


Recognizing an evolution card is pretty easy. They will usually have different designs as their background. Moreover, when you go to edit player and select these cards, there will be an added option to evolve them.



To evolve an evolution card, you'll need to satisfy certain conditions, which you can check by going through the card details.


To evolve the starter Emerald cards, just play a game with them (they don't need to be starters).


Once you have completed the condition, go to edit player.


Select the card.


Go to evolutions and hold the X/A button till the meter fills up.



Image via Destructoid


That's all you need to complete an evolution. Once the upgrade is complete, your superstar's card stats and design will change. If you have joined the party in early access, you can get a starting lineup of five 88-rated Ruby items for free of cost. Yes, it will take some time to evolve all of them, and no, there's no way to grow them together.


Completing the starter evolution agenda will also reward you with a Series 1 Deluxe pack. At the start of our journeys, every bit helps, and I was lucky enough to pull a 90-OVR Amethyst Joel Embiid from my free pack.

The post How to evolve a player in NBA 2K25 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to evolve a player in NBA 2K25

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Out of all the hidden secrets in Astro Bot, the Lost Galaxy proves to be the most challenging with its secretive features. And even if the bird guide points you in the right direction, it won't explain what steps must be taken. So, if you want to solve this puzzle, we'll show you how to unlock Az-Tech Trail Lost Galaxy in Astro Bot and where to find all collectibles.


How to solve Az-Tech Trail fire puzzle in Astro Bot


You'll find the Az-Tech Trail's Lost Galaxy at the third checkpoint, where you'll encounter a Matryoshka doll-like enemy. Eliminate it and use your froggy hands on the red target of the statue. Jump on the ladybug and hit the four torches on the nearby wall.


Screenshot by Destructoid


If you can't reach them all, punch the ladybug again to get you closer to them. Once …
articles.title: How to unlock Az-Tech Trail Lost Galaxy in Astro Bot

articles.author: Randy Marr
articles.description:
One of the biggest strengths of Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow is its Soul system. It lets you capture enemies' special properties and abilities and use whatever loadout they choose. A great way to add variety and customization to the combat, making Dawn of Sorrow an all-time favorite of mine.


However, there are secret combinations of souls that can unlock special effects. These combinations help give you more to consider when setting up your loadout. It can be a lot of silly fun to mess around with different souls to see what synergizes well. We've created this guide to help identify all the combos and their unique extra effects so you don't have to do the legwork. 


Image by Destructoid


Bullet Soul
Guardian Soul
Combo Effect


Flame Demon - Shoot a large fireball
Bat Company - Turn int…
articles.title: All the Soul Combos in Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
Wolfhook in Genshin Impact is used to ascend Mondstadt's resident wolf boy Razor and the adorable Mika. This material can be collected in one specific location within Teyvat. Here's where you can find it.


Wolfhook Genshin Impact location


Southwest of the main Mondstadt town across the water, you'll find Wolvendom. This is where you'll find Wolfhooks growing within the wilderness. Unfortunately, it's one of the most annoyingly hidden. They grow within thick bushes that make these small purple fruits so hard to find. Keep following up the path throughout Wolvendom until you reach Lupus Boreas, Dominator of Wolves. 


Screenshots by Destructoid


Keep running into the bushes and frantically press the grab button to get the Wolfhooks you require. There are usually two in each bush. It can …
articles.title: Where to find Wolfhook in Genshin Impact

articles.author: Julián F.L.
articles.description:
Last week, Paramount Pictures revealed the first trailer for the third live-action Sonic the Hedgehog movie, and, if the memes are anything to go off of, it looks like fans are ready to dive in this December.
All this excitement around the trailer's debut had seasoned Sonic fans remembering the last project from this cinematic universe, the Knuckles TV show on Paramount +, which featured a bizarre yet amusing scene centered on the "Flames of Disaster." It blew up as a fandom meme, especially across Twitter.

Wade from the live-action Knuckles show becomes the star of a new meme


Since the trailer's debut, Sonic the Hedgehog fans have been spreading this now-infamous "Flames of Disaster!" video all over social media. And with Knuckles making an appearance in the third movie's trailer, fans…
articles.title: ‘The Flames of Disaster’ catch fire again after Knuckles’ showdown in new Sonic live-action traile

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Second Circuit Court of Appeals has dealt a blow to the Internet Archive's digital book lending program. The court upheld a lower court's decision, stating that IA's practice of scanning and lending copyrighted books without permission is not fair use. IA's lending program directly threatens the revenues of publishers and violates copyright law, the judges ruled.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Internet Archive Loses Landmark E-Book Lending Copyright Appeal Against Publishers

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Major sports rightsholders and broadcasters in Canada have selected UK-based site-blocking veterans Friend MTS to carry out all pirate IPTV blocking under a Federal Court injunction obtained during the summer. The fact that NHL, NBA, and Premier League streams will be blocked by major Canadian ISPs was widely reported. Yet, with significantly less fanfare, it appears that the UFC and MLB have also entered the blocking arena.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: UFC & MLB Join Pirate IPTV Blocking as Broadcasters Collaborate to Cut Costs

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
This weekend, popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy went 'offline' displaying an image that some interpreted as a farewell message. Today the site returned and uploads at third-party sites resumed simultaneously. This is the second time in a few weeks that the site has gone through this mysterious cycle. The main question that remains: Why?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy is Back Online & Uploads Resume

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After obtaining an injunction and an invasive search and seizure order at Canada's Federal Court, teams from Bell, Rogers, Disney, Paramount, Columbia, and Warner Bros. targeted the alleged operators of IPTV service SmoothStreams at their homes in Canada. The defendants were charged with contempt of court when they failed to comply with the terms of the order. Two years later, the defendants are paying a heavy price and the main case hasn't even started.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bell, Rogers & MPA’s Pirate IPTV Lawsuit is a Slow-Motion Money Pit Nightmare

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Nhentai, a popular adult site with dozens of millions of monthly visits, has been sued for copyright infringement. The lawsuit was filed by California company PCR Distributing, which operates several hentai brands. The complaint alleges that nhentai doesn't respond to takedown notices. The site attempted to settle the dispute confidentially months ago, but that attempt failed. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Pirate’ Site nHentai Sued in U.S. Court for Copyright Infringement

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A co-founder of a group, formed to raise awareness of "damaging" religious instruction received by schoolchildren in the U.S., now has support from the Electronic Frontier Foundation. After Zachary Parrish published the LifeWise Academy's children's curriculum on the website of 'Parents Against LifeWise' he was sued for copyright infringement. In support of a motion to dismiss, EFF says that copyright law isn't a tool to silence critics and a fair use defense will prevail.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EFF Assists Critic’s Fair Use Defense Over Kids’ Religious Program ‘Leak’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cheat seller AimJunkies has suffered two new setbacks in its legal battle with 'Destiny 2' developer Bungie. The Seattle District Court refused to overturn a jury verdict issued in May and will not grant a new trial. Separately, the Court of Appeals affirmed a $4.3 million arbitration award, concluding that no clear errors were made and that the scale of the award is not “completely irrational”
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Denies Cheat Seller AimJunkies a New Trial, Affirms Bungie’s $4.3m Win

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Inside Out 2' tops the chart, followed by 'Borderlands'. 'Trap' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/02/2024

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
The spectacular demise of Fmovies, Aniwave, and a dozen or more related big-brand pirate sites, has former users asking the same question: Are they really gone forever? With many resurrections and Dr. Who-like regenerations over recent years, some seem optimistic. Government records suggests that business bridges are being built from Hollywood to Vietnam, and back again. It seems unlikely that the resurrection of pirate sites would help in any way.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies & Aniwave: Will The Masters of Pirate Resurrection Rise Again?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy once again confuses users with a mysterious message. Instead of the usual list of downloads, it simply shows an image from the film Logan and the brief message "TG Forever". This is similar to a notice that appeared on the site a few weeks ago, after which it eventually resumed business as usual. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy Spooks Users with More ‘Downtime’

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this month, U.S. law enforcement seized several domain names belonging to popular sports streaming site Streameast. However, instead of shutting down operations, the site is fighting back. After launching new backup domains, the site's operators inform TorrentFreak that they plan to challenge the seizure warrant in court.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Sports Streaming Site Streameast Plans to Appeal U.S. Domain Name Seizures

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Despite malware having an even worse reputation than piracy, until now police operations to take sites down, explicitly because they're involved in both, have been pretty much non-existent. This week, music industry group IFPI revealed Operation Redirect, "the first operation of its kind in Brazil to target illegal sites associated with malware distribution." Intrigued by the announcement, we took a closer look and found plenty of drama.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation Redirect: Police Anti-Malware Action Protects Music & Pirates

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Fmovies, one of the most popular pirate streaming sites of recent times, disappeared a few weeks ago. No credit was taken by authorities or rightsholders, not even when related giants including AniWave fell this week. Today, initial suspicions are confirmed; anti-piracy group ACE says it assisted Vietnamese authorities to shut down the piracy ring. In parallel, the Vietnamese Government is organizing a promo tour in Hollywood.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fmovies Piracy Ring Was Shut Down by Vietnam, Assisted By ACE

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
A copyright lawsuit, filed in June by the world's largest educational publishers, accused Google of promoting pirate sites and profiting from piracy, among other things. This week Google responded to the Cengage Learning-led complaint with a motion to dismiss all but one of the publishers' claims, describing them as "tacked on" as part of a "kitchen-sink pleading strategy."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Google Asks Court to Gut “Kitchen Sink” Lawsuit Claiming it Profits From Piracy

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Fmovies was once the world's most popular pirate streaming site. Then mid-June, after years of smooth sailing, it vanished into thin air. Sites with over a billion annual visits tend not to throw everything away so easily. Yet last night, a site with close to two billion visits disappeared in similar circumstances, rapidly followed by another, and then many others after that. In the absence of an official announcement, earlier today we took an early sift through the wreckage.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Sites, Billions of Visits, Wiped Out in Hours: Sifting the Fmovies Wreckage

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
After the recent shutdown of Fmovies, right now an entire streaming empire is collapsing. Big name casualties include Fboxz.to, Aniwave.to, Anix.to, AnimeSuge, Zoroxtv, the list goes on. In a message displayed on their homepages, visitors are advised to use legal options from now on. The exact same message appeared when 123movies threw in the towel a few years ago. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Streaming Giants Fboxz, AniWave, Zoroxtv & Others Dead in Major Collapse

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Claims that Italy will launch Piracy Shield 2.0 at the end of the year appear to be overly optimistic. With just four months left of 2024, a software supplier hasn't even been chosen yet. With the current system falling over, previously blocked domains and IP addresses are being unblocked to make room for new ones, something that the law has no provision for. Meanwhile, smart TV manufacturers will soon be asked to ban a VPN app from their sets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield 2.0 in Doubt For 2024 , TV Manufacturers Urged to Ban VPN

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Do you know someone who sells dodgy streaming boxes or pirate IPTV streams? In Ireland, anti-piracy group FACT in partnership with Crimestoppers would like you to 'report' this activity. These 'snitch' initiatives are not widely embraced by the public but with a six-week social media push, the campaign aims to identity new enforcement targets.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pssst… Want to Snitch on Sellers of Pirate Streaming Services?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
"House of the Dragon" is one of the most watched TV series, particularly among pirates. The second season ended earlier this month after the eighth episode, though many fans had hoped for more. Pirates who downloaded the unexpected 'House of the Dragon S02E09' release got a surprise bonus, but not the one they were hoping for. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Bonus’ Episode of ‘House of the Dragon’ Comes With a Nasty Surprise for Pirates

Support for Pixel 9 Series Devices
You can now test your apps on the Google Pixel 9 series device configurations. Android Studio and the latest Android Emulator now have device definitions for the Pixel 9, Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL, and the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, enabling you to validate your apps on these virtual devices to ensure they react correctly to a variety of screen sizes and device types. You should use API 35 with the Pixel 9 AVDs to ensure the best experience and access to the latest platform features.
